```{r}
library(convexr)
X <- Variable(c(2, 2))
y <- Variable()
p <- minimize(vecnorm(X) + y, 2 * X <= 1, transpose(X) + y >= 1, X >= 0, y >= 0)
cvx_optim(p)
optval(p)
```

## Lasso

```{r}
library(convexr)

lasso2 <- function(x, y, lambda){
    p <- ncol(x)
    n <- J(nrow(x))
    x <- J(x)
    y <- J(y)
    lambda <- J(lambda)
    beta <- Variable(p)
    p1 <- minimize(sum((y - x %*% beta) ^ 2) / n + lambda * sum(abs(beta)))
    cvx_optim(p1)
    value(beta)
}

n <- 1000
p <- 100
Sigma <- outer(1:p, 1:p, function(i, j) 0.5 ^ abs(i - j))
x <- matrix(rnorm(n * p), n, p) %*% chol(Sigma)
beta0 <- rep(0, p)
beta0[1:4] <- c(5, 1, 0, 2)
y <- x %*% beta0 + 0.2 * rnorm(n)

betahat <- round(lasso2(x, y, 0.5), 4)
betahat[1:4]

## You can see that the rest elements of betahat are all zero.
all(betahat[5:p] == 0)
```

## Smallest Circle

```{r}
library(convexr)

center <- function(x, y){
    x <- J(x)
    y <- J(y)
    p <- Variable(2)
    p1 <- minimize(maximum((x - p[1]) ^ 2 + (y - p[2]) ^ 2))
    value(p)
}

n <- 20
x <- rnorm(n)
y <- rnorm(n)

p <- center(x, y)
p
plot(x, y, asp = 1)
plotrix::draw.circle(p[1], p[2], radius = sqrt(max((x - p[1]) ^ 2 + (y - p[2]) ^ 2)))
```


## Support Vector Machine

```{r}
library(convexr)

svm <- function(x, y, lambda){
    p <- ncol(x)
    n <- J(nrow(x))
    x <- J(x)
    y <- J(y)
    lambda <- J(lambda)
    w <- Variable(p)
    b <- Variable()
    p1 <- minimize(sum(pos(1 - y * (x %*% w - b))) / n + lambda * sum(w ^ 2))
    cvx_optim(p1)
    list(w = value(w), b = value(b))
}

n <- 100
p <- 2
Sigma <- outer(1:p, 1:p, function(i, j) 0.5 ^ abs(i - j))
x1 <- 0.2 * matrix(rnorm(n / 2 * p), n / 2, p) %*% chol(Sigma) + outer(rep(1, n / 2), rep(0, p))
x2 <- 0.2 * matrix(rnorm(n / 2 * p), n / 2, p) %*% chol(Sigma) + outer(rep(1, n / 2), rep(1, p))
x <- rbind(x1, x2)
y <- c(rep(1, n / 2), rep(-1, n / 2))

r <- svm(x, y, 0.5)
r


```

## Figures

The figure sizes have been customised so that you can easily put two images side-by-side. 

```{r, fig.show='hold'}
plot(1:10)
```
